Name: Graphite by Peter Gast

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast
Review Text: Highly recommended. Excellent dishes. Beautiful and very very tasteful. Friendly service. Plan to come back.

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast
Review Text: Absolutely splendid restaurant with a great atmosphere. The food and service was also top notch. Definitely worth a detour if you are looking to have fine dining in Amsterdam

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere and great service. Some of the dishes are more interesting, some not that much, but the Lobster dish and the mushroom foam were to die for!

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast
Review Text: Great food. Great personnel. Excellent wines. Bit on the pricy side though.

Name: Graphite by Peter Gast
Review Text: Wow! Very nice cozy restaurant. Also very good for dining solo.
